verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--tumi yei siddhānta kahile
ei dui puṅthi sei saba sākṣī dile

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord said; tumi—you; yei—whatever; siddhānta—conclusion; kahile—informed; ei dui—these two; puṅthi—books; sei—that; saba—everything; sākṣī—evidence; dile—gave.
translation: The Lord said, "Whatever you have told Me about devotional service is all supported by these two books."
